GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v4.9.325
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_notsent_lowat.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.325 by commit 91e21df688f8a75255ca9c459da39ac96300113a, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit c9bee3b7fdecb0c1d070c7b54113b3bdfb9a3d36. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_notsent_lowat.
